name: url-shortener
title: URL Shortener
description: Experience the joy of shortening URLs to your heart's desire with Raycast's URL Shortener! Enjoy the convenience of free URL shortening, without the need for an API key or any rate limits. The domains you can use are: tinyurl.com, shrtco.de, 9qr.de, and shiny.link
author: Visual-Studio-Coder

commands.name: shorten-url
commands.title: Shorten URL Using Selected Text
commands.description: Using your selected text (a valid link), URL Shortener will replace it with a shortened link which redirects to your desired selected URL.

commands.name: shorten-url-withargs
commands.title: Shorten URL Using Argument
commands.description: Using the inputted argument (a valid link), URL Shortener will copy a shortened version of the link to the clipboard which redirects to your desired selected URL.

preferences.name: domain
preferences.title: Domain
preferences.description: This is what will be used in your shortened links.

preferences.name: clipboard
preferences.title: Clipboard
preferences.description: For the command that converts selected text into a shortened link, choose between copying the shortened link to the clipboard or pasting it to the active window.
